member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip
member.summary: An enhanced tooltip which includes a title, image and footer.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.Provider
member.summary: Gets the which is associated with this tip.
member.value: The which was associated with this tip by , or .

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.TitleImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the image displayed beside the title.
member.remarks:
The title image is always displayed on the left side in left-to-right layouts, and on the right side for right-to-left layouts. The maximum image size is 128x128.
Design-time Note: This property provides additional design-time services when loading icon files. An icon containing multiple sizes or color depths will cause a dialog to appear that allows you to choose which size and color depth is loaded. Loading 32-bit icons with an 8-bit alpha channel is also supported.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: An which represents the image displayed beside the title.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title displayed in bold at the top of the tip.

remarks.para: Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.

member.value: A which represents the title displayed in bold at the top of the tip.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.Shortcut

member.value: The displayed beside the title.

member.summary: Gets or sets the image displayed beside the text.

The image is always displayed on the left side in left-to-right layouts, and on the right side for right-to-left layouts. The maximum image size is 128x128.

An icon containing multiple sizes or color depths will cause a dialog to appear that allows you to choose which size and color depth is loaded. Loading 32-bit icons with an 8-bit alpha channel is also supported.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.DisabledText
member.summary: Gets or sets the text displayed when the component is disabled. When this property is null, the regular text is always used.
member.remarks:

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.AccessKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut that may be pressed to raise the event when the tip is displayed.
member.remarks:
This property is useful to provide extended help or additional actions that can be performed. For example, you could use a value of "Press F1 for additional help", and then handle the event to display additional help.

member.value: The key combination which, when pressed, causes the event to be raised.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.MaximumWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of the tip. Text which would cause the tip to be wider than this value is word-wrapped.
member.remarks:
The minimum value of this property is 192.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: An value representing the maximum width of the tip, in pixels.

member.value: True if the tip will be displayed; otherwise, false, and the tip is never displayed.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTip.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the tip is displayed as enabled. When this property is false, the disabled message and text and displayed on the tip.
member.remarks: When no specific value is assigned to this property, its value is determined by quering a property called "Enabled" on the associated component. If no property called "Enabled" exists, the Enabled property of the parent control is returned instead.
member.value: True if the tip is displayed enabled; otherwise, false, and the tip is displayed as disabled.

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.Rendering.VisualTipLayout
member.summary: Describes the layout of text and graphics on a .

remarks.para: The properties and methods in this type can be used to determine where a draws each element of a VisualTip. This enables you to change the location of these elements without writing the actual drawing code.

Before a VisualTipRenderer draws a tip, it calls to determine where each element is positioned. By overridding the method, you can return a custom instead. It is also possible to call the base OnCreateLayout method, and then set the location of only the elements you require.
For example, let's assume you would like to swap the location of the image and text so that the image appears on the right, and the text appears on the left. Implement the following code:
[VB.NET]
remarks.code:
Private Class CustomRenderer Inherits VisualTipRenderer
Protected Overloads Overrides Function OnCreateLayout(ByVal tip As VisualTip) As VisualTipLayout
Dim layout As VisualTipLayout = MyBase.OnCreateLayout(tip)
' obtain the original bounds Dim text As Rectangle = layout.GetElementBounds(VisualTipRenderElement.Text) Dim disabled As Rectangle = layout.GetElementBounds(VisualTipRenderElement.DisabledMessage) Dim image As Rectangle = layout.GetElementBounds(VisualTipRenderElement.Image)
' swap the coordinates Dim imageX As Integer = image.X image.X = text.Right - image.Width text.X = imageX disabled.X = imageX
' re-assign the new bounds layout.SetElementBounds(VisualTipRenderElement.Text, text) layout.SetElementBounds(VisualTipRenderElement.DisabledMessage, disabled) layout.SetElementBounds(VisualTipRenderElement.Image, image)
Return layout End Function End Class

member.name: M:Skybound.VisualTips.Rendering.VisualTipLayout.Offset(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Offsets the layout by the specified amount.
member.param: The amount by which the layout is translated right.
The amount by which the layout is translated down.
member.remarks: This method translates all elements of the layout, including the and .

member.returns: A which represents the size of the area.

member.param: The element whose bounding rectangle is returned.
member.returns: A which represents the bounding rectangle of an element in the layout.

member.summary: Sets the bounding rectangle of an element in the layout.
member.param: The element whose bounding rectangle is set.
The new bounding rectangle for the element.

member.remarks: This rectangle represents the bounds of the window itself. It does not include the shadow.

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions
member.summary: Specifies additional options which affect how a is displayed.

remarks.para: The "Position" values specify only a recommended position for a tip. The bounds of the tool area on the screen also help determine where the tip is positioned. For example, if a value of is specified, but the tool area falls along the right edge of the screen, the tip will be positioned to the right of the tool area instead.

Each of the "HideOn" values is associated with an event on the source control. When one of the "HideOn" values is specified, and its associated event is raised on the source control, the tip is hidden. For example, if a value of is specified, the tip will be hidden when the control loses the input focus -- that is, when the LostFocus event of the control is raised.

Pressing the Escape key always hides the most recently displayed tip. By default, this key event is not passed through to the source control. When the value is specified, the key event is passed through.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.Default
member.summary: Specifies the default display options.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.PositionMask
member.summary: The bit mask used to determine the default position of the tip.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.PositionBottom
member.summary: The tip is positioned below the tool area by default.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.PositionRight
member.summary: The tip is positioned to the right of the tool area by default.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.PositionLeft
member.summary: The tip is positioned to the left of the tool area by default.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.PositionTop
member.summary: The tip is positioned above the tool area by default.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.HideOnMouseLeave
member.summary: The tip is hidden when the mouse leaves the tool area. Only one tip with this option is displayed on the screen at a time.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.HideOnKeyDown
member.summary: The tip is hidden when any key is pressed while the source control has the input focus.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.HideOnKeyPress
member.summary: The tip is hidden when any character key is pressed while the source control has the input focus.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.HideOnMouseDown
member.summary: The tip is hidden when any mouse button is pressed on the source control.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.HideOnLostFocus
member.summary: The tip is hidden when the source control loses the input focus.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.HideOnTextChanged
member.summary: The tip is hidden when the text is changed in the source control.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayOptions.ForwardEscapeKey
member.summary: Forwards the Escape Key event (which hides the tip) through to the source control.

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.Rendering.VisualTipBalloonRenderer

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.Rendering.VisualTipRenderer
member.summary: Provides a set of methods to draw and measure objects, and a base class for custom renderers.

remarks.para: This type provides the foundation for all rendering types. You may create a custom appearance for your tips by inheriting from this tip and overridding certain methods.

Each may be assigned a unique . At design-time, this is done by selecting one of the predefined renderers from the drop-down list of the VisualTipProvider.Renderer property in the property grid. Using code, assign a new instance of a VisualTipRenderer-derrived type to the Renderer property. All tips displayed by the provider will be painted and measured using the assigned renderer.
Each element of a tip -- the images and text -- are represented by a value. Many methods in this type have parameters of the VisualTipRenderElement type.
When a tip is painted, the following overridable methods are called (in this order):

list.item: is called once for each value of .

remarks.para: In addition, the and methods may be called at any time.
To customize only the fonts or colors used by the renderer, override these methods instead:

list.item: returns the font used for a specific element.
returns the font used for a specific element.

remarks.para: VisualTipRenderer also provides a number of support methods which make it easier to write a custom renderer:

list.item: returns whether the tip has a footer.
returns the text that will be displayed in the title area. The return value combines the title and shortcut text.
returns the text displayed in the body of a tip (the displayed text may be different when the tip is displayed for a disabled component).
returns whether the tip should be drawn with a soft shadow.
measures and returns the recommended size of a .

A null value may not be returned by . This exception should only be raised when you have overridden and your code returns a null reference.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.FooterImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the default image displayed beside the footer text on a .
member.remarks:
This image is displayed in the footer of all tips by default, unless a specific value has been assigned.
Design-time Note: This property provides additional design-time services when loading icon files. An icon containing multiple sizes or color depths will cause a dialog to appear that allows you to choose which size and color depth is loaded. Loading 32-bit icons with an 8-bit alpha channel is also supported.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: An which is displayed beside the footer text on a .

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.FooterText
member.summary: Gets or sets the default footer text on a .
member.remarks:
This text is displayed in the footer of all tips by default, unless a specific value has been assigned.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: A which represents the default footer text on a .

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.DisabledMessage
member.summary: Gets or sets the message written in bold above the text when the control is disabled.
member.remarks:
This text is displayed as the disabled message the footer of all tips by default, unless a specific value has been assigned.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: A which represents the message written in bold above the text when the control is disabled.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.TitleImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the default image displayed beside the title of a visual tip which does not have another image assigned.
member.remarks:
The image assigned to this property will be used as the title image for all visual tips displayed by this , when the property of the tip is null. Tips with other images assigned to their TitleImage property will display those images instead.
Design-time Note: This property provides additional design-time services when loading icon files. An icon containing multiple sizes or color depths will cause a dialog to appear that allows you to choose which size and color depth is loaded. Loading 32-bit icons with an 8-bit alpha channel is also supported.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: An which represents the image displayed beside the title of a visual tip which does not have another image assigned.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets the opacity level of a VisualTip, ranging from 0 (transparent) to 1 (opaque).
member.remarks: Alpha transparency is not supported on Windows 98 and ME. Under those operating systems, VisualTips are displayed opaque.
member.value: A value which represents the opacity level of a VisualTip. The default value is 0.94.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.MaximumWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width of a VisualTip. Text which would cause a tip to be wider than this value is word-wrapped.
member.remarks:
This property can be overridden for an individual tip using the VisualTip.MaximumWidth property. The minimum value of this property is 192.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: An value representing the maximum width of a tip, in pixels.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.AccessKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut that may be pressed to raise the event when a tip is displayed.
member.remarks:
This property can be overridden for an individual tip using the VisualTip.AccessKey property. The default value of this property is F1.
Note to Translators: This property is marked with the . When the Localizable designer property on a form is set to , the value of this property is persisted in the resource file associated with each culture. You can localize these resource files without modifying the code.
member.value: An value representing the maximum width of a tip, in pixels.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.InitialDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time which passes, in milliseconds, before a tip is displayed.
member.value: An value which specifies the amount of time which passes, in milliseconds, before a tip is displayed. The default value is SystemInformation.DoubleClickTime * 2.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.ReshowDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the amount of time which must pass, in milliseconds, before a tip is displayed when the mouse is moved from one component to another.
member.value: An value which specifies the amount of time which passes, before a tip is displayed when the mouse is moved from one component to another. The default value is SystemInformation.DoubleClickTime.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.ShowAlways
member.summary: Gets or sets whether VisualTips are displayed even when the form does not have the input focus.
member.value: True if VisualTips are displayed even when the form does not have the input focus; otherwise, false, and VisualTips are only displayed when the form as the input focus. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.Animation
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines if and how a VisualTip is animated when it is displayed.
member.value: One of the values to determines if and how a VisualTip is animated when it is displayed.
member.exception: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the enumeration.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.Shadow
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines whether a visual tip has a shadow.
member.remarks: Shadows are not supported on Windows 98 and ME.
member.value: One of the values that determines whether a visual tip has a shadow.
member.exception: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the enumeration.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.DisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that determines when a visual tip is displayed.
member.value: One of the values that determines when a visual tip is displayed.
member.exception: The value assigned to the property is not a valid member of the enumeration.

member.name: E:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.DisplayModeChanged
member.summary: Occurs when the value of the property is changed.

member.name: E:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.AccessKeyPressed
member.summary: Occurs when the access key is pressed for a VisualTip.

member.name: E:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.TipPopup
member.summary: Occurs before a VisualTip is displayed.
member.remarks: Set the property to true to prevent the tip from appearing.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.IsTipDisplayed
member.summary: Gets a value to indicate whether a tip is being displayed by the current .
member.value: True if a tip is currently displayed; otherwise, false, and no tip is displayed.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipProvider.TrackedTip
member.summary: Gets the which is currently being tracked.
member.remarks: A tracked tip is automatically undisplayed when the mouse touches it. In any given application, only one may be tracked at a time. This property returns the tip which is currently being tracked, or if no tip is tracked.
member.value: The which is currently being tracked.

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.IVisualTipExtender
member.summary: Provides a set of methods for determining the parent and child components of a control.

remarks.para: This interface enables you to add VisualTips support to custom controls which do not already provide it.

There are two steps to adding VisualTips support to a custom control. First, create a custom type which implements . Second, invoke , passing the System.Type of the custom control and an instance of the type which implements .
The methods of are:

list.item: returns the child component which exists at a specified set of coordinates. VisualTips calls this method repeatedly while the mouse is moved over the control to determine which tooltip should be displayed when the mouse stops.
returns the parent component of a given child component.
returns an array the types of child components for which the control may display tooltips.

example.para: The standard .NET ToolBar control is already supported by VisualTips. However, if you were to implement it manually, your code might look something like this:

member.name: M:Skybound.VisualTips.IVisualTipExtender.GetChildAtPoint(System.Windows.Forms.Control,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the child component which containes the given coordinates.
member.param: The parent whose child component is to be returned.
The x-coordinate of the mouse.
The y-coordinate of the mouse.
member.returns: The child component which contains the given coordinates.

member.name: M:Skybound.VisualTips.IVisualTipExtender.GetParent(System.Object)
member.summary: Returns the parent control of the specified component.
member.param: The child component whose parent is returned.
member.returns: An which represents the parent of .

member.name: M:Skybound.VisualTips.IVisualTipExtender.GetChildTypes
member.summary: Returns an array containing the type of child components which are supported by this .
member.returns: An array of containing the type of child components supported by this .

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipNotifyIcon

member.summary: No icon is displayed.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipNotifyIcon.Information
member.summary: The icon is a circle with an "i" in the center.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipNotifyIcon.Warning
member.summary: The icon is an exclamation point.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipNotifyIcon.Error
member.summary: The icon is a red circle with an "x" in the center.

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.Rendering.VisualTipOfficePreset
member.summary: Represents a set of default colors used by a .

remarks.para: Each property of this class is a VisualTipOfficePreset that represents a default set of colors used to draw a VisualTip using the Office style.

To use a VisualTipOfficePreset, assign it to the property of a . Once it has been assigned, the default values of the various Color properties in the VisualTipOfficeRenderer will be changed to the colors defined by the preset. If you change the value of a VisualTipOfficeRenderer color property after assigning a preset, the original preset remains unchanged.

member.name: P:Skybound.VisualTips.Rendering.VisualTipOfficePreset.AutoSelect
member.summary: A preset which selects , , or depending on the system colors.
member.remarks: This is the default color preset.

member.summary: A preset which matches the windows XP silver theme.

member.summary: A preset based on brown.

member.name: T:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayMode
member.summary: Specifies if and when a visual tip is displayed by a .

member.summary: Visual tips are displayed when the mouse hovers over the object for a specific amount of time.

member.name: F:Skybound.VisualTips.VisualTipDisplayMode.HelpRequested
member.summary: Visual tips are displayed when help is requested, using the '?' button in the top right corner of a dialog box, or by pressing F1.

member.summary: Visual tips must be displayed manually by calling VisualTipProvider.ShowTip.
